## Criteria Checklist

Please confirm your tool meets all criteria:

- [ ] **Open source** - Code is public under an OSI-approved license
- [ ] **No login required** - Core functionality works without an account
- [ ] **Local-first** - User data stays in the browser
- [ ] **No ads, no tracking** - No surveillance; privacy-respecting analytics only
- [ ] **Static hostable** - Can run from GitHub Pages or similar
- [ ] **Single purpose** - Does one thing well
